conbody.p: Surplus personal property that has completed screening in accordance with 45.602-3 (a) shall be sold in accordance with the policy for the sale of surplus personal property contained in the Federal Management Regulation, at part 102-38 (41 CFR part 102-38). Agencies may specify implementing procedures.
